name: Psyshield Bash
description: You cloak yourself in psychic energy before striking your target. Make a melee attack on a creature, doing 1d12 + MOVE psychic damage on a hit. Your AC is increased by 1 until the end of your next turn.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
